(cold-blooded [coldblood], swamp-survival [swampsurvival], swimming [swimming])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
In the Empoisoners' Guild, apprentices are trained to make poison bullets. These bullets crack open on impact, releasing poisonous fumes. The poison slingers use these bullets with slings to increase the range of their weapons.
